message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm confident you'll find it incredibly valuable.  I'm asking for $11,500, which is still a great deal considering its value to you.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buying the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you're trying to work within your budget, but $9,500 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a little more to $10,500.  That's a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product.  What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $9,800. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $9,800 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,100. This price reflects the value you'll gain from the product and allows me to make a fair profit. Let's try to make this work!

I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. I'll offer $9,500, and I'll also agree to pay within 7 days to give you a bit more certainty. This is my final offer, so I hope we can make a deal!
